conversion_verification.notes: The render appears to be a 2D floor plan with shadows and some depth added to furniture, but no true 3D conversion of the architectural structure itself.

detected_errors.description: The second image is still a 2D floor plan with added visual elements like shading and furniture, but without actual 3D wall height, thickness, or an angled perspective to reveal true depth. It fails the fundamental 3D conversion requirements.

summary: This conversion was rejected as the second image is still fundamentally a 2D floor plan, failing to exhibit true 3D architectural transformation with visible wall height and thickness from an angled perspective.
